Watch On Youtube

exploring the myths, legends, fairytales and folk songs of old england

Finding Folklore is an expansive project exploring the intersections of folktale, folk music and folk tradition in England, through performance storytelling, historical discussion, and newly commissioned recordings from musicians.

New episodes released occasionally, with deep dive companion videos following soon after.

Follow us @findingfolklore on social media, or join our mailing list for more.
